title: The Asset Allocator: My Top ETF Pick For 2020
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: My top ETF choice for 2020 is the iShares MSCI Israel ETF (EIS). This podcast (7:37) explains my search for an investment that offers appreciation potential, and yet which is also defensible against the ill winds that can bring stock prices down precipitously. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
